text: The 1900 Normal School Owls football team was an American football team that represented the Normal School of Arizona (later renamed Arizona State University) as an independent during the 1900 college football season. In their third season under head coach Frederick M. Irish, the team compiled a 1–1 record and played both of its games against Phoenix High School, losing the first game, 5–0, and winning the second game by the same score. ==References== Normal School Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football seasons Category:1900 in Arizona Territory
title: 1900 Normal School Owls football team
